00088 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_RunControl {
00089 
00090 public:
00091 
00098     EGS_RunControl(EGS_Application *app);
00099 
00101     virtual ~EGS_RunControl();
00102 
00104     void setNcase(EGS_I64 n) { if( n > 0 ) ncase = n; };
00105 
00107     void setNbatch(int n) { if( n > 0 ) nbatch = n; };
00108 
00110     void setMaxTime(EGS_Float t) { maxt = t; };
00111 
00113     void setRequiredUncertainty(EGS_Float a) { accu = a; };
00114 
00116     EGS_I64 getNcase() const { return ncase; };
00117 
00119     int     getNbatch() const { return nbatch; };
00120 
00122     int     getNchunk() const { return nchunk; };
00123 
00131     virtual int     startSimulation();
00132 
00142     virtual EGS_I64 getNextChunk() { return getNcase() - ndone; };
00143 
00154     virtual int     finishSimulation();
00155 
00162     virtual bool    startBatch(int,EGS_I64);
00163 
00170     virtual bool    finishBatch();
00171 
00172     virtual bool    storeState(ostream &data);
00173     virtual bool    setState(istream &data);
00174     virtual bool    addState(istream &data);
00175     virtual void    resetCounter();
00176     virtual bool    getCombinedResult(double &, double &) const
00177                      { return false; };
00178 
00179     virtual EGS_I64 getNdone() const { return ndone; };
00180     virtual void    setNdone(EGS_I64 Ndone) { ndone = Ndone; };
00181     virtual void    incrementNdone() { ++ndone; };
00182     virtual EGS_Float getCPUTime() const { return cpu_time+previous_cpu_time;};
00183 
00184     static EGS_RunControl* getRunControlObject(EGS_Application *);
00185 
00186     int             geomErrorCount, geomErrorMax;
00187 
00188 protected:
00189 
00190     EGS_Application *app;
00191     EGS_Input       *input;
00192 
00193     EGS_I64         ncase;  // number of histories.
00194     EGS_I64         ndone;  // histories done so far.
00195     EGS_Float       maxt;   // maximum time to run in hours.
00196     EGS_Float       accu;   // statistical uncertainty sought.
00197     int             nbatch; // number of batches.
00198     int             restart;// =0 => fresh calculation
00199                             // =1 => restart calculation
00200                             // =2 => analyze results
00201                             // =3 => combine parallel run
00202     int             nchunk; // number of simulation "chunks"
00203 
00204     EGS_Timer       timer;
00205     EGS_Float       cpu_time;
00206     EGS_Float       previous_cpu_time;
00207 
00208 };
